AVEVA Group plc

Director/PDMR Shareholding

 

AVEVA Group plc announces that on 4 February 2021 it was notified of the following share option exercise and sale of shares which took place:

James Kidd, Deputy CEO and CFO

On 4 February 2021 Mr Kidd exercised options over 54,782 shares at an exercise price of 3 5/9 pence per share following the 2017 award under the AVEVA Group Long Term Incentive Plan. Mr Kidd sold 25,832 of the resulting shares at a price of £36.73 per share to settle associated tax and national insurance liabilities, retaining the balance of 28,950 shares.
